## Enumerations

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[TrackedState](./blockly.renderedconnection_namespace.trackedstate_enum.md)


</td><td>

Enum for different kinds of tracked states.

WILL\_TRACK means that this connection will add itself to the db on the next moveTo call it receives.

UNTRACKED means that this connection will not add itself to the database until setTracking(true) is explicitly called.

TRACKED means that this connection is currently being tracked.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
